## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BHP, ILK5</u>
- **Gene Name:** BLUE LIGHT-DEPENDENT H+-ATPASE PHOSPHORYLATION
- **Description:**   Integrin-linked protein kinase family;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2117129
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
